Returns: the backing @B_android#support#test#espresso#ViewAssertion_E@ that can be used to explicitly check accessibility
the backing @B_com#google#android#apps#common#testing#accessibility#framework#integrations#espresso#AccessibilityValidator_E@, on which options for check execution can be set
enable().Description: Enables accessibility checking as a global ViewAssertion in @B_android#support#test#espresso#action#ViewActions_E@.

ClassDesc: use @B_android#support#test#espresso#accessibility#AccessibilityChecks_E@ instead. A class to enable automated accessibility checks in Espresso tests. These checks will run as a global ViewAssertion, and cover a variety of accessibility issues (see @B_com#google#android#apps#common#testing#accessibility#framework#AccessibilityCheckPreset#LATEST_E@ to see which checks are run).
